definition.value: Includes orders for nutrition to be administered or consumed in an inpatient or acute care setting
Includes orders for nutrition to be administered or consumed in an outpatient setting (for example, Emergency Department, Outpatient Clinic, Outpatient Surgery, Doctor's office)
Includes orders for nutrition to be administered or consumed by the patient in their home (this would include long term care or nursing homes, hospices, etc.).
Includes statements about nutrition use, including over the counter medication, provided by the patient, agent or another provider
